channel.title: CVE Feed for shopizer-ecommerce -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for shopizer-ecommerce -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-23060|2024-09-16T17:17:57.190Z -- shopizer-ecommerce -- shopizer
item.description: A Stored Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in Shopizer versions 2.0 through 2.17.0, where a privileged user (attacker) can inject malicious JavaScript in the filename under the “Manage files” tab

item.title: CVE-2022-23063|2024-09-16T19:09:20.842Z -- shopizer-ecommerce -- shopizer
item.description: In Shopizer versions 2.3.0 to 3.0.1 are vulnerable to Insufficient Session Expiration. When a password has been changed by the user or by an administrator, a user that was already logged in, will still have access to the application even after the password was changed.
